text: Optimize optical network performance, avoid traffic congestion, reduce average latency, and improve bandwidth utilization.
Intent Conversion: Optimize optical network performance, avoid traffic congestion, reduce average latency to 5ms, and improve bandwidth utilization to 99%.

text: Create a slice where, in a factory environment, different production lines can be connected to a private network slice to ensure isolation and provide dedicated QoS
Intent Conversion: Create a private network slice in a factory environment to connect different production lines, ensuring isolation and providing dedicated QoS with latency less than 10ms and bandwidth utilization of 95%.

text: Deploy a new network slicing service.
Intent Conversion: Deploy a new network slicing service with a minimum guaranteed bandwidth of 100 Mbps, latency below 50 ms, and a packet loss rate less than 0.01% to meet various service requirements.

text: Add the intermediate box deep Packet Detection DPI and firewall to the router.
Intent Conversion: Add an intermediate box with deep Packet Detection DPI and a firewall to the router.

text: Create a path between the router and the switch.
Intent Conversion: Create a path between the router(192.168.1.1) and the switch(192.168.1.15).

text: Create a path with the minimum bandwidth set to 5Mbps.
Intent Conversion: Establish a network path between the router with ip address 192.168.1.1 and the switch with ip address 192.168.1.18, setting the minimum bandwidth to 5Mbps to ensure sufficient data transfer rates.

text: Create a path with the maximum latency set to 10ms.
Intent Conversion: Establish a network path between the router (ip address 192.168.1.1) and the firewall (ip address 192.168.1.20), setting the maximum latency to 10ms to ensure timely data transmission.

text: Create a path not including devices where middle box firewall is equal to IDS.
Intent Conversion: Establish a network path avoiding any devices where the middle box firewall functionality is identical to an IDS, ensuring the path does not include such devices for security purposes.

text: Create a path only including devices where attribute firewall is equal to IDS.
Intent Conversion: Establish a network path that exclusively includes devices with the firewall attribute set to IDS, ensuring that only devices with this specific configuration are part of the path for enhanced security monitoring.

text: Providing video streaming services to its customers.
Intent Conversion: Deliver high-quality video streaming services to customers with a minimum bandwidth of 50Mbps, latency below 60ms, and less than 0.1% packet loss rate to ensure smooth playback.

text: Build a connection between the server and R3(router) such that outgoing packets go through a different path than incoming packets and the one-way delay (whatever the direction) does not exceed 50 ms.
Intent Conversion: Establish a bidirectional connection between the server(ip address 192.168.1.10) and router3(ip address 192.168.1.20) with asymmetric routing for outgoing and incoming packets, ensuring a one-way delay of no more than 5ms in either direction for low-latency communication.

text: Edge2 is an 18-unit edge node with a connection to cloud1 node that has an average latency of 135ms and a bandwidth of 80Mbps.
Intent Conversion: Edge2 is an 18-unit edge node with a connection to cloud1 node that has an average latency of 135ms and a bandwidth of 80Mbps.

text: Enhance the game service with edge privacy and Cloud request logging capabilities.
Intent Conversion: Enhance the game service by implementing edge privacy measures and enabling Cloud request logging to improve security and monitoring, ensuring compliance with data protection regulations.

text: The service must be reachable in less than 50ms from the user’s location and, to feature optionally 100Mbps download bandwidth from the service to its Cloud backend.
Intent Conversion: Ensure the service is accessible within a 50ms response time from the user's location and offer an optional 100Mbps download bandwidth from the service to the Cloud backend for high-speed data transfer.

text: Constraining tenant Pods to certain regions or node types.
Intent Conversion: Restrict tenant Pods' traffic to pass through certain regions or node types.

text: Scheduling Pods from different tenants on different nodes.
Intent Conversion: Schedule Pods from distinct tenants onto separate nodes to ensure tenant isolation and optimize resource utilization.

text: Scheduling Pods from different tenants on different isolated network segments.
Intent Conversion: Schedule Pods from distinct tenants onto different nodes connected to isolated network segments to ensure network-level tenant isolation and enhance security.

text: Scheduling Pods with different privilege levels on different nodes.
Intent Conversion: Schedule Pods with varying privilege levels onto separate nodes to maintain security boundaries and optimize resource allocation according to privilege requirements.

text: Monitoring the bandwidth/latency and security posture of the K8s cluster network topology.
Intent Conversion: Implement continuous monitoring of the bandwidth, latency, and security posture across the K8s cluster network topology.

text: Set a connection as a high availability network service.
Intent Conversion: Configure the network connection for IRC to be designated as a high availability service, ensuring less than 50ms of average latency across the network, and maintaining a packet loss rate below 0.01% to guarantee reliable and consistent service performance.

text: Always maintain high quality of service and high bandwidth for gold level users.
Intent Conversion: Ensure gold level users experience consistently high quality of service with a minimum bandwidth of 100Mbps and a maximum latency of 20ms to guarantee seamless and premium service delivery.

text: Set a path between the endpoints provided in the request message that traverses a given number of network functions.
Intent Conversion: Establish a network path between the specified endpoints in the request message, ensuring the path traverses the required number of network functions, such as firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and load balancers, to meet the security and performance requirements.

object.@value: firewalls, intrusion detection systems and load balancers

text: All the traffic originating at a node with ip address 10.0.3.1 and terminating at a destination node with ip address 10.0.11.1 should pass through a network function chain made by a firewall and a DPI.
Intent Conversion: All the traffic originating at a node with ip address 10.0.3.1 and terminating at a destination node with ip address 10.0.11.1 should pass through a network function chain made by a firewall and a DPI.

text: I want caching for content X to handle 20GB/min.
Intent Conversion: Implement caching for business file transfer to handle 20GB/min.

text: I would like to have a holographic communication between Concordia University and Ericsson and also would like to store it.
Intent Conversion: Establish a holographic communication between Concordia University and Ericsson and also would like to store it.

text: If excessive bandwidth usage is detected, the system restricts the bandwidth between hosts A and B.
Intent Conversion: Monitor bandwidth usage between hosts 10.0.1.25 and 10.0.1.36, and automatically apply restrictions when excessive usage is detected to maintain network performance and prevent potential congestion.

text: Use VLAN to connect hosts 10.0.0.12 and 10.1.0.15.
Intent Conversion: Implement VLAN configuration to establish a network connection between hosts 10.0.0.12 and 10.1.0.15

text: If the bandwidth usage of line c1 exceeds 80%, the video conferencing traffic passes through line c2.
Intent Conversion: Monitor the bandwidth usage of line c1 and automatically route video conferencing traffic to line c2 when the usage exceeds 80% to ensure continuous and stable video conferencing service.

text: Start a web service that can handle 1000 transactions per second with high levels of reliability and security.
Intent Conversion: Deploy a high-performance web service capable of managing 1000 transactions per second with high levels of reliability and security.

object.@value: high levels of reliability and security

text: Improve mobility robustness at the cell edge at location L.
Intent Conversion: Improve mobility robustness at the cell edge at location L.

text: Inspect the traffic for the dorm.
Intent Conversion: Perform a detailed analysis of network traffic for the dormitory area.

text: Blocking traffic from YouTube.
Intent Conversion: Blocking incoming network traffic from YouTube.

text: Blocking traffic from the dormitory.
Intent Conversion: Blocking incoming network traffic from the dormitory.

text: Blocking traffic from Twitter.
Intent Conversion: Blocking incoming network traffic from Twitter.

text: Block incoming traffic for tenant 10.0.1.20.
Intent Conversion: Blocking incoming network traffic for tenant 10.0.1.20.

text: Reroute traffic from the internet to an inspection middlebox.
Intent Conversion: Reroute internet traffic to an inspection middlebox for deep packet inspection and security scanning.

text: Limit the bandwidth of guest users using torrent applications.
Intent Conversion: Implement bandwidth limiting policies for guest users on the network to restrict the usage of torrent application

text: Establish a data usage quota for students in the university dorms.
Intent Conversion: Create and enforce a data usage quota for students residing in the university dorms to manage network resources effectively.

text: Block a specific website for students in the labs.
Intent Conversion: Block foreign website traffic for students in the labs.

text: Add a daily temporal bandwidth throttle to the server racks from 4pm to 7pm.
Intent Conversion: Implement a daily temporary bandwidth limitation on server racks between 4pm and 7pm to manage network traffic during peak hours.

text: Limit students to a maximum download capacity of 10GB per week in the dormitory.
Intent Conversion: Establish a weekly data download limit of 10GB for students in the dormitory.

text: Add firewalls and intrusion detection for client B from the gateway to the backend with at least 100Mbps bandwidth and HTTPS only allowed.
Intent Conversion: Add firewalls and intrusion detection for client B (ip address 10.0.0.12) from the gateway to the backend with at least 100Mbps bandwidth and HTTPS only allowed.

text: H323 video conferencing was allowed by the University firewall.
Intent Conversion: H323 video conferencing traffic was allowed by the University firewall.

text: MSN audio and video communications were not allowed by the University firewall
Intent Conversion: MSN audio and video communications traffic were not allowed by the University firewall

text: Student quota dorms 10GB week.
Intent Conversion: Establish a data usage quota of 10GB per week for students in the dorms.

text: limit students to 10GB maximum download per week in dorms
Intent Conversion: limit students to 10GB maximum download quota per week in dorms

text: Set-up an SDN-based slice where reliable traffic for Gold customers flows from the gateway to the application server with at least 5Mbps of bandwidth through an SDN mesh topology composed of 5 switches and 2 VFs and where VF1 is connected to Switch 1 and VF2 is connected to Switch 3.
Intent Conversion: Establish an SDN-based network slice to ensure reliable traffic for Gold customers from the gateway to the application server with a minimum bandwidth of 5Mbps.

text: Set-up an SDN-based slice where 1:1 reliability scheme is applied to flow traffic with expedited forwarding scheme from an IoT gateway VF to a video server VF with at least totally guaranteed 5Mbps of throughput.
Intent Conversion: Establish an SDN-based network slice with a 1:1 reliability scheme to ensure expedited forwarding of traffic from the IoT gateway VF to the video server VF, while guaranteeing a minimum throughput of 5Mbps to support high-quality video streaming and data transfer.

text: Minimize the router's MLU(maximum link utilization).
Intent Conversion: Minimize the router's MLU(maximum link utilization) to a target value of 50%.

text: Minimize average latency and reduce latency beyond SLA requirements.
Intent Conversion: Optimize network performance to minimize average latency to below the target value of 10ms and ensure that latency does not exceed the SLA requirements, providing a high-quality service experience for end-users.

text: I want a conversational video service where 80% of users have a QoE of at least 4.0.
Intent Conversion: Develop a conversational video service that ensures at least 80% of users achieve a Quality of Experience (QoE) at least 4.0.

object.@value: with 80% users having QoE of at least 4.0

text: Guarantee the quality of services such as VoIP and video streaming in real time.
Intent Conversion: Ensure that real-time services including VoIP and video streaming meet Quality of Service (QoS) standards by maintaining a minimum bandwidth of 5Mbps, adhering to latency requirements below 10ms, and keeping packet loss rate below 0.001% to provide a seamless and high-quality user experience.[^111^]

text: For at least 80% of end users using conversational video services, the QoE should be greater than 4.4, with a maximum bit rate (MBR) of 10 Mbit/s per user.
Intent Conversion: Ensure that a minimum of 80% of end users experience a Quality of Experience (QoE) score above 4.4 for conversational video services, while maintaining a maximum bit rate (MBR) of 10 Mbit/s per user to provide seamless and high-quality video interactions.

text: UE using URLLC services has a maximum latency of 50 milliseconds, a maximum packet loss rate of 1%, and an MBR of 10 Mbps.
Intent Conversion: Configure the network to ensure that User Equipment (UE) utilizing URLLC services experiences no more than 50 milliseconds of latency, does not exceed a packet loss rate of 1%, and is allocated a minimum bit rate (MBR) of 10 Mbps.

text: The MBR for all elements of the object should be set to 10 Mbit/s.
Intent Conversion: Configure the maximum bit rate (MBR) for all elements of the object to 10 Mbit/s.

text: Always maintain high quality of service and high bandwidth for gold level users.
Intent Conversion: Ensure gold level users consistently experience a high quality of service with a minimum guaranteed bandwidth of 100 Mbps.

text: Set a connection as a high availability network service.
Intent Conversion: Configure a network connection for end users to be recognized as a high availability service, ensuring at least 99.9% uptime.

text: Set-up an SDN-based slice where reliable traffic for Gold customers flows from the gateway to the server with at least 5mbps of bandwidth through an SDN mesh topology composed of 3 switches and 2 VFs and where VF_1 is connected to Switch 1 and VF_2 is connected to Switch 3.
Intent Conversion: Establish an SDN-based network slice to ensure reliable traffic for Gold customers from the gateway to the server with a minimum bandwidth of 5 Mbps, utilizing an SDN mesh topology with 3 switches and 2 VFs, specifically configuring VF_1 to be connected to Switch 1 and VF_2 to Switch 3, to meet the service level agreement (SLA) requirements.

text: My server application should be able to handle at least 10,000 HTTP requests and a minimum bandwidth of 1 Gbps.
Intent Conversion: Ensure the server application is capable of managing a minimum of 10,000 HTTP requests per second and maintain a minimum bandwidth of 1 Gbps to support high traffic volumes and data-intensive operations.

Intent Conversion: Optimize the performance of data transfer nodes to maintain CPU utilization below 80%.

text: Ensure the deployment of the network slice meets the specified service-level agreement (SLA) with regard to latency, bandwidth, and reliability.
